entry.sentence: Patrem sat in his tower chamber , magnifying glasses on his nose , and gazed with bated breath at the exposed piece of positronic brain on the table .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (NNP Patrem)) (VP (VP (VBD sat) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN tower) (NN chamber))) (, ,) (S (VP (VBG magnifying) (NP (NNS glasses)) (PP (IN on) (NP (PRP$ his) (NN nose)))))) (, ,) (CC and) (VP (VBD gazed) (PP (IN with) (NP (JJ bated) (NN breath))) (PP (IN at) (NP (NP (DT the) (VBN exposed) (NN piece)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (JJ positronic) (NN brain)) (PP (IN on) (NP (DT the) (NN table))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(sat-2, Patrem-1) nsubj(gazed-15, Patrem-1) root(ROOT-0, sat-2) poss(chamber-6, his-4) nn(chamber-6, tower-5) prep_in(sat-2, chamber-6) xcomp(sat-2, magnifying-8) dobj(magnifying-8, glasses-9) poss(nose-12, his-11) prep_on(magnifying-8, nose-12) conj_and(sat-2, gazed-15) amod(breath-18, bated-17) prep_with(gazed-15, breath-18) det(piece-22, the-20) amod(piece-22, exposed-21) prep_at(gazed-15, piece-22) amod(brain-25, positronic-24) prep_of(piece-22, brain-25) det(table-28, the-27) prep_on(brain-25, table-28)

entry.sentence: With one hand he held the hair-thin tweezers , with the other the tiny pulse generator .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (PP (IN With) (NP (CD one) (NN hand))) (NP (PRP he)) (VP (VBD held) (NP (DT the) (JJ hair-thin) (NNS tweezers)) (, ,) (PP (IN with) (NP (NP (DT the) (JJ other)) (NP (DT the) (JJ tiny) (NN pulse) (NN generator))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: Just a small touch , a minimal deviation , and all the preliminary work would have been for nothing .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (RB Just) (NP (DT a) (JJ small) (NN touch)) (, ,) (NP (DT a) (JJ minimal) (NN deviation)) (, ,) (CC and) (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (JJ preliminary) (NN work))) (VP (MD would) (VP (VB have) (VP (VBN been) (PP (IN for) (NP (NN nothing)))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: He pressed the hard edges of his lips together , focused once more on the point to be hit , and finally placed the pulse generator exactly between the two nerve endings on the contact plate .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP He)) (VP (VP (VBD pressed) (S (NP (NP (DT the) (JJ hard) (NNS edges)) (PP (IN of) (NP (PRP$ his) (NNS lips)))) (ADJP (RB together)))) (, ,) (VP (VBD focused) (ADVP (ADVP (RB once) (RBR more)) (PP (IN on) (NP (DT the) (NN point)))) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB be) (VP (VBN hit)))))) (, ,) (CC and) (ADVP (RB finally)) (VP (VBD placed) (NP (DT the) (NN pulse) (NN generator)) (ADVP (RB exactly)) (PP (IN between) (NP (DT the) (CD two) (NN nerve) (NNS endings))) (PP (IN on) (NP (DT the) (NN contact) (NN plate))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: For a moment she opened her eyes and looked at him .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (PP (IN For) (NP (DT a) (NN moment))) (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VP (VBD opened) (NP (PRP$ her) (NNS eyes))) (CC and) (VP (VBD looked) (PP (IN at) (NP (PRP him))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: Then the light behind the pupil went out .
